name: Champion
description: Battlemasters who embody heroic ideals, protecting the innocent and inspiring allies through noble deeds and selfless courage, becoming beacons of hope on the battlefield.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and heroic techniques
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 during combat, +10 when protecting allies
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform heroic combat maneuvers and protective techniques
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to protective abilities and inspirational presence
Can be temporarily boosted through heroic resolve in critical situations
Successful protection of allies restores a portion of stamina

resource_systems.name: Combat Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration and battlefield awareness that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 20 when landing critical hits or successfully protecting allies
Increases by 15 per 10 seconds in active combat
Decreases by 20 when allies take significant damage despite protection
Decreases by 15 per minute when out of combat
Can be spent to enhance protective abilities or execute heroic techniques
Higher Combat Focus increases defensive reactions and inspirational effects

resource_systems.name: Command Authority
resource_systems.description: Measure of leadership presence and ability to inspire allies in battle
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully protecting allies or demonstrating heroic deeds
mechanics: Increases by 15 when successfully protecting allies from harm
Increases by 20 when performing heroic deeds that inspire others
Decreases by 15 when allies are defeated despite protection attempts
Decreases by 20 when forced to retreat or abandon allies
Can be spent to issue powerful inspirational abilities that enhance allies
Higher Command Authority increases the effectiveness of protective and inspirational abilities

resource_systems.name: Heroic Inspiration
resource_systems.description: Measure of inspirational presence and ability to embody heroic ideals
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when performing heroic deeds or inspiring others through noble actions
mechanics: Increases by 15 when performing selfless acts to protect others
Increases by 10 when inspiring allies to overcome seemingly impossible odds
Decreases by 15 when forced to act against heroic ideals
Decreases by 10 when allies lose hope despite inspirational efforts
Can be spent to perform legendary heroic deeds or inspire extraordinary courage
At maximum Heroic Inspiration, enter a state of perfect heroic embodiment

class_mechanics.name: Heroic Presence
class_mechanics.description: Inspirational aura that embodies heroic ideals and inspires allies
effects: Naturally inspires courage and hope in allies within visual range
Able to bolster ally morale and resistance to fear effects
Can project an aura of protection that enhances ally defensive capabilities
Presence causes uncertainty and hesitation in evil-aligned enemies
Can inspire ordinary people to perform extraordinary feats of courage

class_mechanics.name: Protector's Resolve
class_mechanics.description: Exceptional ability to defend allies and absorb damage meant for others
effects: Can intercept attacks meant for allies within range
Able to establish protective zones that reduce damage to allies within
Can enhance personal defensive capabilities when protecting others
Presence naturally draws enemy attention away from vulnerable allies
Can endure extraordinary punishment when defending others

class_mechanics.name: Heroic Combat
class_mechanics.description: Combat style that emphasizes honorable engagement and inspiring techniques
effects: Can perform combat maneuvers that inspire allies while damaging enemies
Able to challenge powerful enemies to honorable combat, focusing their attention
Can execute perfect defensive techniques that demonstrate martial mastery
Presence enhances the combat effectiveness of honorable allies
Can defeat enemies in ways that maximize inspirational impact

class_mechanics.name: Selfless Courage
class_mechanics.description: Willingness to sacrifice personal safety for the good of others
effects: Gains power bonuses when taking risks to protect others
Able to endure normally debilitating injuries when fighting for a noble cause
Can inspire similar selflessness in allies, creating a chain of protective actions
Presence naturally calms and reassures those in danger
Can achieve seemingly impossible feats when protecting the innocent

signature_abilities.name: Heroic Sacrifice
signature_abilities.description: Temporarily redirect all damage meant for nearby allies to yourself while gaining extraordinary defensive capabilities
mechanics: For 1 minute, intercept all attacks and harmful effects targeting allies within 30 meters
Gain 50% damage reduction and immunity to stun, fear, and mind control effects
Each intercepted attack increases your offensive capabilities against the attacker
If health drops below 25%, gain temporary invulnerability for 10 seconds
At the end of the effect, release a wave of healing energy to all nearby allies
Costs 100 Stamina, 50 Command Authority, and 75 Heroic Inspiration

signature_abilities.name: Banner of Hope
signature_abilities.description: Plant a magical banner that inspires extraordinary courage and resilience in all allies
mechanics: Create a magical banner that remains for 5 minutes or until destroyed
All allies within 50 meters gain significant bonuses to attack, defense, and morale
Allies near the banner recover from negative status effects more quickly
Enemies within range must pass a willpower check or suffer penalties to attack
If the banner would be destroyed, can sacrifice personal health to maintain it
Costs 75 Stamina, 100 Command Authority, and 50 Heroic Inspiration

signature_abilities.name: Moment of Glory
signature_abilities.description: Enter a state of perfect heroic embodiment, becoming a legendary warrior of light
mechanics: For 3 minutes, transform into a radiant embodiment of heroic ideals
Size increases by 25%, strength and charisma doubled
Weapons glow with holy light, dealing additional damage to evil creatures
Each attack inspires nearby allies, granting them temporary combat bonuses
Presence alone causes fear and demoralization in evil enemies
Costs 50 Stamina, 75 Command Authority, and 100 Heroic Inspiration

skill_trees.name: Path of the Protector
key_abilities: Guardian's Shield: Redirect damage from allies to yourself with enhanced damage reduction
Protective Aura: Create a zone of protection that reduces damage to all allies within
Selfless Interception: Instantly move to intercept attacks targeting vulnerable allies

skill_trees.name: Path of Inspiration
key_abilities: Heroic Presence: Inspire extraordinary courage and performance in all nearby allies
Rally the Fallen: Revitalize defeated or demoralized allies with renewed strength
Beacon of Hope: Become a shining symbol that dispels fear and doubt in allies

skill_trees.name: Path of the Hero
skill_trees.focus: Embodying heroic ideals through combat excellence
key_abilities: Heroic Challenge: Force powerful enemies to engage you in honorable combat
Legendary Deed: Perform combat maneuvers of such perfection they inspire all who witness them
Champion's Resolve: Overcome seemingly impossible odds through sheer heroic determination

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Commander skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Good alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Sacrifice personal safety to protect others in a critical situation
Inspire allies to victory against overwhelming odds

legendary_items.name: Lightbringer
effects: Strength increased by 5

Inspires all allies within visual range, improving morale and combat effectiveness

effects: Constitution increased by 3
Can redirect attacks targeting nearby allies to yourself

effects: Charisma increased by 5

lore: Champions represent the most noble path a Battlemaster can take, having dedicated their martial prowess and leadership abilities to protecting the innocent and inspiring others through heroic deeds. These paragons of virtue have transcended ordinary combat leadership to become living symbols of hope and courage, capable of turning even the most desperate situation into victory through selfless sacrifice and inspirational presence. The path to becoming a Champion requires not only exceptional combat skills and tactical acumen but also unwavering moral conviction and a genuine desire to protect others at any cost. Those who succeed find themselves capable of inspiring extraordinary courage in allies and striking fear into the hearts of evil, their very presence changing the dynamics of any battlefield they enter. Champions typically serve as elite protectors of important people or places, leaders of righteous military orders, or wandering heroes who travel to where they are most needed. Many establish or join knightly orders dedicated to protecting the innocent and fighting injustice, training others to follow their heroic example. Some even become legendary figures whose mere mention inspires courage in the downtrodden and fear in tyrants. Their combination of combat prowess, protective abilities, and inspirational leadership makes them invaluable in conflicts against overwhelming evil, where their presence can rally otherwise hopeless resistance and turn the tide against seemingly unstoppable foes. Though they may lack the raw destructive power of more offense-focused classes, the protective strength and morale-boosting capabilities of Champions make them perhaps the most valuable allies when facing truly dire threats that would break the spirit of ordinary warriors.
